thread.title: Timeshare Industry Honours Its Best Performers Stellar Performance By Accor Vacation Club
thread.title_full: Timeshare Industry Honours Its Best Performers Stellar Performance By Accor Vacation Club

author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Timeshare Industry Honours Its Best Performers Stellar Performance By Accor Vacation Club
text:
Email 
The booming Timeshare Industry held its 24 th annual National Industry Awards on Friday night, at a gala dinner at the Gold Coast Arts Centre, where the theme was tropical, but despite plunging winter temperatures, the competition was positively hot for the top gongs. 
Accor Vacation Club CEO Craig Wood had nothing but the highest praise for his individual staff members and teams who between them won eight awards . Craig Wood himself, was also recognised for his 25 years of service to the Timeshare Industry. 
“I am always thrilled that the hard work, dedication and commitment of our valued employees continues to be recognized in these awards, considered to be the top echelon of industry performers” Craig Wood, CEO of Accor Vacation Club said. 
“Our 31,000+ Member-base win each and every time they have contact with all these people and their teams, and their holiday experience is enhanced by the high quality of the people we employ and the service they provide year round” he continued. This slideshow requires JavaScript. 
“On behalf of the entire Accor Vacation Club and all our staff across Australia, New Zealand and Indonesia, our heartiest congratulations go out to the 2015 winners from Accor Vacation Club” he concluded. Share this:
